00012 #define AXIS_H_

00014 #include <wx/wxfreechartdefs.h>

00020 
00021 enum AXIS_LOCATION {
00022         AXIS_LEFT = 1,
00023         AXIS_RIGHT,
00024         AXIS_TOP,
00025         AXIS_BOTTOM,
00026 };
00027 
00028 class Axis;
00029 
00033 class AxisObserver
00034 {
00035 public:
00036         AxisObserver();
00037         virtual ~AxisObserver();
00038 
00043         virtual void AxisChanged(Axis *axis) = 0;
00044 
00049         virtual void BoundsChanged(Axis *axis) = 0;
00050 };
00051 
00055 class WXDLLIMPEXP_FREECHART Axis : public wxObject, public Observable<AxisObserver>
00056 {
00057         DECLARE_CLASS(Axis)
00058 
00059         friend class Plot;
00060 public:
00065         Axis(AXIS_LOCATION location);
00066         virtual ~Axis();
00067 
00072         AXIS_LOCATION GetLocation()
00073         {
00074                 return m_location;
00075         }
00076 
00081         bool IsVertical()
00082         {
00083                 return (m_location == AXIS_LEFT) || (m_location == AXIS_RIGHT);
00084         }
00085 
00090         bool IsHorizontal()
00091         {
00092                 return !IsVertical();
00093         }
00094 
00101         void SetMargins(wxCoord marginMin, wxCoord marginMax)
00102         {
00103                 m_marginMin = marginMin;
00104                 m_marginMax = marginMax;
00105                 FireAxisChanged();
00106         }
00107 
00108         //
00109         // Window functions.
00110         //
00111 
00112         void SetWindowWidth(double winWidth)
00113         {
00114                 if (m_winWidth != winWidth) {
00115                         m_winWidth = winWidth;
00116                         FireAxisChanged();
00117                 }
00118         }
00119 
00120         double GetWindowWidth()
00121         {
00122                 return m_winWidth;
00123         }
00124 
00125         void SetWindowPosition(double winPos)
00126         {
00127                 if (m_winPos != winPos) {
00128                         double minValue, maxValue;
00129                         GetDataBounds(minValue, maxValue);
00130 
00131                         m_winPos = wxClip(winPos, minValue, maxValue - m_winWidth);
00132 
00133                         FireAxisChanged();
00134                 }
00135         }
00136 
00137         double GetWindowPosition()
00138         {
00139                 return m_winPos;
00140         }
00141 
00142         void SetUseWindow(bool useWin)
00143         {
00144                 if (m_useWin != useWin) {
00145                         m_useWin = useWin;
00146                         FireAxisChanged();
00147                 }
00148         }
00149 
00150         void SetWindow(double winPos, double winWidth)
00151         {
00152                 m_winPos = winPos;
00153                 m_winWidth = winWidth;
00154                 FireAxisChanged();
00155         }
00156 
00157         bool IntersectsWindow(double v0, double v1);
00158 
00159         void GetWindowBounds(double &winMin, double &winMax)
00160         {
00161                 double minValue, maxValue;
00162                 GetDataBounds(minValue, maxValue);
00163 
00164                 winMin = m_winPos;
00165                 winMax = wxMin(maxValue, winMin + m_winWidth);
00166         }
00167 
00171         void AddDataset(Dataset *dataset)
00172         {
00173                 if (AcceptDataset(dataset)) {
00174                         m_datasets.Add(dataset);
00175                 }
00176         }
00177 
00183         virtual void GetDataBounds(double &minValue, double &maxValue) = 0;
00184 
00190         virtual wxCoord GetExtent(wxDC &dc) = 0;
00191 
00197         virtual bool IsVisible(double value);
00198 
00204         virtual double BoundValue(double value);
00205 
00214         virtual wxCoord ToGraphics(wxDC &dc, int minCoord, int gRange, double value);
00215 
00224         virtual double ToData(wxDC &dc, int minCoord, int gRange, wxCoord g);
00225 
00229         virtual void UpdateBounds() = 0;
00230 
00236         virtual void Draw(wxDC &dc, wxRect rc) = 0;
00237 
00243         virtual void DrawGridLines(wxDC &dc, wxRect rcData) = 0;
00244 
00245 protected:
00253         virtual bool AcceptDataset(Dataset *dataset) = 0;
00254 
00255         Array<Dataset, 1, true> m_datasets;
00256         wxPen m_gridLinesPen;
00257 
00258         wxCoord m_marginMin;
00259         wxCoord m_marginMax;
00260 
00261         double m_winPos;
00262         double m_winWidth;
00263         bool m_useWin;
00264 
00265         FIRE_WITH_THIS(AxisChanged);
00266         FIRE_WITH_THIS(BoundsChanged);
00267 
00268 private:
00269         AXIS_LOCATION m_location;
00270 };

00273 double ToData(int minCoord, int gRange, double minValue, double maxValue, wxCoord margin, bool vertical, wxCoord g);
